[DQC.US.0086.9368] The element us-gaap:DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetNoncurrent with a value of 1,762,000 has been used in the filing. This element is a transition element and is intended to be used in periods before adoption of amendments from Accounting Standards Update 2015-17.
